description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Commands to manage Application Accelerator in Azure Spring Apps.

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator create
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Create Application Accelerator in Azure Spring Apps instance.
examples: az spring application-accelerator create --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator delete
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Delete Application Accelerator from Azure Spring Apps instance.
examples: az spring application-accelerator delete --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring application-accelerator show
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) Show the settings, provisioning status and runtime status of Application Accelerator.
examples: az spring application-accelerator show --service MyCluster --resource-group MyResourceGroup
